actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that no license shall be issued for the construction of a new nuclear fission power plant until after the people of the affected counties or political subdivisions have approved such construction in a referendum.

summary.text: Provides, under the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, that no license shall issue for the construction of a new nuclear fission powerplant until after the people of the affected counties or political subdivisions have approved such construction in a referendum.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that no license shall be issued for the construction of a new nuclear fission power plant until after the people of the affected counties or political subdivisions have approved such construction in a referendum.
